channel.title: OKE on See Hiong's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in OKE on See Hiong's Blog

item.title: Deploying KServe on OKE
item.description: This post walks through deploying KServe on Oracle Kubernetes Engine (OKE) to enable scalable, serverless machine learning model serving. It details the setup process, including configuring Istio, cert-manager, and Knative, and addresses common deployment challenges on OKE. The guide also covers testing a sample model to verify the setup. By the end, readers will have a functional KServe environment running on OKE, ready for production-grade ML inference workloads.
